info.title: Book Store API
info.description:
API documentation for Book Store application with comprehensive book management, user authentication, and advanced search capabilities.

**Important Note for Strapi v5:**
- For GET requests: You can use either `id` (number) or `documentId` (24-char alphanumeric string)
- For PUT/DELETE requests: You MUST use `documentId` (24-char alphanumeric string)
- Example: GET /api/categories/133 OR /api/categories/o9m182bqf02l0zjrq8weqfwz
- Example: PUT /api/categories/o9m182bqf02l0zjrq8weqfwz (documentId required)

path.description: The folder where the file(s) will be uploaded to (only supported on strapi-provider-upload-aws-s3).

ref.description: The unique ID (uid) of the model which the file(s) will be linked to (api::restaurant.restaurant).

field.description: The field of the entry which the file(s) will be precisely linked to.

get.description: Get books that are currently trending based on high ratings (5.0 stars)

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of trendy books to return

get.description: Get books that are featured by the store (staff picks, best sellers, etc.)

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of featured books to return

get.description: Search books by title, author, or description
Get books that are similar to the specified book based on categories and tags

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of similar books to return

shipping_address.example: 123 Nguyen Hue Street, Ho Chi Minh City

DocumentIdNote.description: Important: In Strapi v5, use documentId (alphanumeric string) for PUT/DELETE operations, not the numeric id. GET operations accept both.

id.description: Numeric ID - use for GET requests only

documentId.description: Document ID (24-character alphanumeric string) - required for PUT/DELETE requests
